languages.text: {n}Дабы выследить врага, нужно слушать. Вдох. Выдох. Вдох. Ритмичный бой двигателей и насосов — так дышит корабль. Так бьется его сердце. Странно ли, что среди рабочих нижних палуб, коротающий срок подобно живым мертвецам, я чувствую себя... дома?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Нужно сосредоточиться. Дабы выследить врага — обратить себя в слух. Вдох. Выдох. Вдох. Что это? Ритмичный бой двигателей и насосов дальше по коридору... Так дышит корабль. Так бьется его сердце. Странно ли то, что среди рабочих нижних палуб, коротающий свой срок подобно живым мертвецам, вынужденным творить ужасные вещи с себе подобными, я чувствую себя... дома?{/n}

languages.text: {n}To find the enemy, I must listen. Inhale. Exhale. Inhale. The rhythmic beat of engines and pumps: that is the ship's breathing. That is the ship's heartbeat. Is it strange that I feel at home among the workers of the lower decks, who pass their time like the living dead? {/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Дабы выследить врага, нужно слушать. Вдох. Выдох. Вдох. Ритмичный бой двигателей и насосов — так дышит корабль. Так бьется его сердце. Странно ли, что среди рабочих нижних палуб, коротающий срок подобно живым мертвецам, я чувствую себя... дома?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}To find the enemy, you must listen. Inhale. Exhale. Inhale. The rhythmic beat of engines and pumps, that is the ship's breathing. That is the ship's heartbeat. Is it strange that I feel at home among the workers on the lower decks, passing their time like the living dead? {/n}

{n}To find the enemy, you must listen. Inhale. Exhale. Inhale. The rhythmic beat of engines and pumps, that is the ship's breathing. That is the ship's heartbeat. Is it strange that I feel at home among the workers on the lower decks, passing their time like the living dead? {/n}

{n}To find the enemy, I must listen. Inhale. Exhale. Inhale. The rhythmic beat of engines and pumps: that is the ship's breathing. That is the ship's heartbeat. Is it strange that I feel at home among the workers of the lower decks, who pass their time like the living dead? {/n}

languages.text: {n}Um den Feind zu finden, muss ich zuhören. Einatmen. Ausatmen. Einatmen. Der rhythmische Schlag der Motoren und Pumpen, das ist der Atem des Schiffs. Das ist der Herzschlag des Schiffs. Ist es merkwürdig, dass ich mich unter den Arbeitern der Unterdecks zu Hause fühle, die ihre Zeit wie die lebenden Toten verbringen? {/n}
languages.original_text: {n}To find the enemy, I must listen. Inhale. Exhale. Inhale. The rhythmic beat of engines and pumps: that is the ship's breathing. That is the ship's heartbeat. Is it strange that I feel at home among the workers of the lower decks, who pass their time like the living dead? {/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Um den Feind zu finden, muss ich zuhören. Einatmen. Ausatmen. Einatmen. Der rhythmische Schlag der Motoren und Pumpen, das ist der Atem des Schiffs. Das ist der Herzschlag des Schiffs. Ist es merkwürdig, dass ich mich unter den Arbeitern der Unterdecks zu Hause fühle, die ihre Zeit wie die lebenden Toten verbringen? {/n}

languages.text: {n}Para encontrar al enemigo, debo escuchar. Inhalo. Exhalo. Inhalo. El latido rítmico de los motores y las bombas: esa es la respiración de la nave. Ese es el corazón de la nave. ¿Es extraño que me sienta cómoda entre los trabajadores de las cubiertas inferiores, que pasan el tiempo como muertos vivientes? {/n}
languages.original_text: {n}To find the enemy, I must listen. Inhale. Exhale. Inhale. The rhythmic beat of engines and pumps: that is the ship's breathing. That is the ship's heartbeat. Is it strange that I feel at home among the workers of the lower decks, who pass their time like the living dead? {/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Para encontrar al enemigo, debo escuchar. Inhalo. Exhalo. Inhalo. El latido rítmico de los motores y las bombas: esa es la respiración de la nave. Ese es el corazón de la nave. ¿Es extraño que me sienta cómoda entre los trabajadores de las cubiertas inferiores, que pasan el tiempo como muertos vivientes? {/n}

languages.text: {n}敵を見つけるには、よく聴かなくてはならない。息を吸う。吐く。吸う。エンジンとポンプのリズミカルな鼓動。それこそが船の鼓動だ。まるで生きるしかばねのように時間を過ごす下層デッキの労働者たちの中で、私がくつろいでいるのは奇妙なことだろうか？{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}To find the enemy, I must listen. Inhale. Exhale. Inhale. The rhythmic beat of engines and pumps: that is the ship's breathing. That is the ship's heartbeat. Is it strange that I feel at home among the workers of the lower decks, who pass their time like the living dead? {/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}敵を見つけるには、よく聴かなくてはならない。息を吸う。吐く。吸う。エンジンとポンプのリズミカルな鼓動。それこそが船の鼓動だ。まるで生きるしかばねのように時間を過ごす下層デッキの労働者たちの中で、私がくつろいでいるのは奇妙なことだろうか？{/n}

languages.text: {n}为了找到敌人，我必须倾听。吸气，呼气，吸气。无数引擎与水泵有节律地跳动着，这便是这艘飞船的心跳。身处底层甲板的工人之中，我感到非常舒适，因为他们打发时间的方式就像行尸走肉一样，这会不会很奇怪？{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}To find the enemy, I must listen. Inhale. Exhale. Inhale. The rhythmic beat of engines and pumps: that is the ship's breathing. That is the ship's heartbeat. Is it strange that I feel at home among the workers of the lower decks, who pass their time like the living dead? {/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}为了找到敌人，我必须倾听。吸气，呼气，吸气。无数引擎与水泵有节律地跳动着，这便是这艘飞船的心跳。身处底层甲板的工人之中，我感到非常舒适，因为他们打发时间的方式就像行尸走肉一样，这会不会很奇怪？{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pour trouver l'ennemi, je dois écouter. Inspirer. Expirer. Inspirer. À chaque pulsation des moteurs et des pompes, c'est comme si le vaisseau respirait. C'est le battement de son cœur. N'est-il pas étrange que je me sente chez moi parmi les ouvriers des ponts inférieurs, qui évoluent tels des morts-vivants ?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}To find the enemy, I must listen. Inhale. Exhale. Inhale. The rhythmic beat of engines and pumps: that is the ship's breathing. That is the ship's heartbeat. Is it strange that I feel at home among the workers of the lower decks, who pass their time like the living dead? {/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pour trouver l'ennemi, je dois écouter. Inspirer. Expirer. Inspirer. À chaque pulsation des moteurs et des pompes, c'est comme si le vaisseau respirait. C'est le battement de son cœur. N'est-il pas étrange que je me sente chez moi parmi les ouvriers des ponts inférieurs, qui évoluent tels des morts-vivants ?{/n}

languages.text: {n}Düşmanı bulmak için dinlemem gerek. Nefes al, nefes ver ve yeniden nefes al. Motorların ve pompaların ahenkli ritimleri... Geminin nefes alışının, geminin kalp atışının sesi bu. Zamanlarını yaşayan ölüler gibi geçiren alt güvertelerdeki işçiler arasında kendimi evimde gibi hissetmem tuhaf mı?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}To find the enemy, I must listen. Inhale. Exhale. Inhale. The rhythmic beat of engines and pumps: that is the ship's breathing. That is the ship's heartbeat. Is it strange that I feel at home among the workers of the lower decks, who pass their time like the living dead? {/n}
